thread.title: BRIEF-AAR Reports Q3 EPS from Continuing Operations of $0.90

title: BRIEF-AAR Reports Q3 EPS from Continuing Operations of $0.90
text: March 20, 2018 / 10:00 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-AAR Reports Q3 EPS from Continuing Operations of $0.90 Reuters Staff March 20 (Reuters) - AAR Corp: * AAR REPORTS THIRD QUARTER FISCAL YEAR 2018 RESULTS * Q3 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS $0.49 * Q3 SALES $456.3 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $477.1 MILLION * Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.48 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * AFFIRMING GUIDANCE FOR FISCAL 2019 * FY2019 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.73, REVENUE VIEW $2.20 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
